There is a lively omniORB mailing list, where you can ask questions about using omniORB, report bugs, and discuss CORBA usage in general.

The mailing list is generously hosted by RealVNC. Go to this page to subscribe, unsubscribe or change your subscription details.

There is a lot of useful information in the mailing list archive.

Search the archive from this page. Alternatively, you may find a Gogle site specific search more effective.
